condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :LA Schedule 2 Section I. E | Description :The Borrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entities to ensurethat their respective parts of the Project shall be implemented in compliance with the Bank's policy on safety of Dams. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :LA Schedule 2, Section I, B. 1 | Description :The Borrower shall ensure that the Project is carried out through:at central level, MWR which will maintain a CPMO headed by a DG level staff; and at provincial, municipal and county levels, aproject leading group headed by senior official in charge in Hebei, Ningxia and Shanxi respectively. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section I. D. 3 | Description :Each Project Implementing Entity shall: a) ensure all works to becarried out under the Project are planned in accordance with the objective to avoid, where feasible, changes in land or water useresulting in involuntary loss by persons of shelter, of productive assets or access to productive assets, and/or income orlivelihood; b) ensure that its PPMO gives due attention to a); c) prepare RESplan | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule Section I. D. 5 | Description :Shanxi shall maintain independent dam safety expert to: a) inspect &evaluate Province existing linked dams safety status, their appurtenances & performance history; b) review & evaluate owner'soperation & maintenance procedures c) review new dam design;Ningxiashall prepare and furnish Bank with a dam safety statusdescription for both Shapotou and Qingtongxia dams in annual progress report. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA Schedule, Section I, A. 1 | Description :Each Project Implementing Entity shall establish, no later thanSeptember 1, 2012, and maintain or cause to be maintained, throughout the period of Project implementation, a PMO at provincial,municipal (except Ningxia) and county levels respectively in Hebei, Shanxi and Ningxia | Frequency :Quarterly
